title: Borrowing Money To Avoid Paying Taxes is Stupid! (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

How to get your finances under control,

The stupidity of borrowing money to avoid paying taxes,

Why you shouldn't buy a house with someone you're not married to,

Where student loan debt goes in the baby steps.


Support Our Sponsor:

DreamCloud

Christian Healthcare Ministries


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
